header.description: Adds Blogs to a phpBB3 board.

Only add this if your server has mod_rewrite enabled (there may be other requirements for this to work as well, but mod_rewrite is all I know of). If you get an internal server error because of adding this mod, remove the changes made to the .htaccess file because the likely reason is that your server does not support this.
edit.action:
RewriteEngine on
Rewriterule ^blog/(.+)/(.+).html$ ./blog/view/blog.php?page=$1&mode=$2 Rewriterule ^blog/(.+).html$ ./blog/blog.php?page=$1 Rewriterule ^blog/(.+)/$ ./blog/view/blog.php?page=$1 Rewriterule ^blog/$ ./blog/blog.php

action-group.diy-instructions:
Go to ACP->Styles->Style Components->Theme, then hit the Refresh button next to prosilver. Go to ACP->Styles->Style Components->Imageset, then hit the Refresh button next to prosilver.
Go to yoursite/blog/install.php in your web browser to install the database section.
Set the user/group permissions and configuration settings.
